body:
All right so as some of you guys know I LOVE trapping people on here on some games when I'm bored of dieing a lot but here's a challenge for the server ;)

Rules
- 3 people trapped in one game, can be different traps, can be a single trap, just 3 peeps one game
- team mates DO NOT count if they fall in, if they fall in it don't count :p

- don't be obnoxious about your traps, make sure that you have fun, and don't make your traps bigger than an 8 by 8 area, but remember you can have multiple traps

*if you do this challenge send me screen shots and have fun*

title: The Trap 3 People In One Game Challenge
